code:
export const aboutLunarLanguages = {
  lightBg: false,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: 'Fall 2020 - Spring 2021',
  headline: 'Lunar Languages',
  description: 'Developed by six students as their senior capstone project, Lunar Languages provides an immersive \
       language-learning experience, allowing users to learn Mandarin Chinese by walking to augmented reality \
      (AR) hotspots located around the Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University Prescott campus.\n\
      The project was designed during Fall 2020 and developed during the Spring 2021 semester. The app was released \
      on the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store, though has since been modified by the Embry-Riddle administration \
      outside of the work of this team.',
  imgStart: '',
  img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
  alt: 'Credit Card'
};
export const locationTracking = {
  lightBg: false,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: 'How to Play',
  headline: 'Walk Around Campus',
  description: 'Players can view their environment and their position, as well as nearby hotspots, via a top-down map. \
       They will be notified if they walk outside the campus boundary.',
  imgStart: '',
  img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
  alt: 'Credit Card'
};
export const hotspots = {
  lightBg: false,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: '',
  headline: 'Visit Hotspots to Learn New Words',
  description: 'When near a hotspot, the player can click on the hotspot icon to open AR mode to learn new words. \
      Each hotspot is themed around different subjects, such as food, people, or language basics.',
  imgStart: '',
  img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
  alt: 'Credit Card'
};
export const practiceMode = {
  lightBg: false,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: '',
  headline: 'Study for a Test or Refresh Your Memory',
  description: 'Players are able to review words they have already learned in practice mode.',
  imgStart: '',
  img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
  alt: 'Credit Card'
};
export const userInformation = {
  lightBg: false,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: '',
  headline: 'See Your Progress!',
  description: 'Players can see their experience and level in different subjects of the Mandarin language.',
  imgStart: '',
  img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
  alt: 'Credit Card'
};
export const development = {
  lightBg: false,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: 'Creation of Lunar Languages',
  headline: 'Development',
  description: 'Lunar Languages was developed using the Unity game engine combined with the software development \
       kits Mapbox, which provides accurate renditions of the player’s environment and real-time tracking \
       of their position, and ARCore, a Google developed plug-in allowing for access to player camera and \
       the superimposition of images onto the player’s view. \n \
       All coding scripts were written in C#; 3D models were created and animated in Blender; and other \
       art and images were created using Clip Studio Paint, Adobe Illustrator, and Procreate.',
  imgStart: '',
  img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
  alt: 'Credit Card'
};
export const personalRole = {
  lightBg: false,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: 'Personal Role',
  headline: 'Project Manager & Team Member',
  description: '',
  imgStart: '',
  img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
  alt: 'Credit Card'
};

sourcesContent:
export const aboutLunarLanguages = {
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'Fall 2020 - Spring 2021',
    headline: 'Lunar Languages',
    description:
      'Developed by six students as their senior capstone project, Lunar Languages provides an immersive \
       language-learning experience, allowing users to learn Mandarin Chinese by walking to augmented reality \
      (AR) hotspots located around the Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University Prescott campus.\n\
      The project was designed during Fall 2020 and developed during the Spring 2021 semester. The app was released \
      on the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store, though has since been modified by the Embry-Riddle administration \
      outside of the work of this team.',
    imgStart: '',
    img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
    alt: 'Credit Card'
  };

  export const locationTracking = {
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'How to Play',
    headline: 'Walk Around Campus',
    description:
      'Players can view their environment and their position, as well as nearby hotspots, via a top-down map. \
       They will be notified if they walk outside the campus boundary.',
    imgStart: '',
    img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
    alt: 'Credit Card'
  };

  export const hotspots = {
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: '',
    headline: 'Visit Hotspots to Learn New Words',
    description:
      'When near a hotspot, the player can click on the hotspot icon to open AR mode to learn new words. \
      Each hotspot is themed around different subjects, such as food, people, or language basics.',
    imgStart: '',
    img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
    alt: 'Credit Card'
  };

  export const practiceMode = {
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: '',
    headline: 'Study for a Test or Refresh Your Memory',
    description:
      'Players are able to review words they have already learned in practice mode.',
    imgStart: '',
    img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
    alt: 'Credit Card'
  };

  export const userInformation = {
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: '',
    headline: 'See Your Progress!',
    description:
      'Players can see their experience and level in different subjects of the Mandarin language.',
    imgStart: '',
    img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
    alt: 'Credit Card'
  };

  export const development = {
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'Creation of Lunar Languages',
    headline: 'Development',
    description:
      'Lunar Languages was developed using the Unity game engine combined with the software development \
       kits Mapbox, which provides accurate renditions of the player’s environment and real-time tracking \
       of their position, and ARCore, a Google developed plug-in allowing for access to player camera and \
       the superimposition of images onto the player’s view. \n \
       All coding scripts were written in C#; 3D models were created and animated in Blender; and other \
       art and images were created using Clip Studio Paint, Adobe Illustrator, and Procreate.',
    imgStart: '',
    img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
    alt: 'Credit Card'
  };
  
  export const personalRole = {
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'Personal Role',
    headline: 'Project Manager & Team Member',
    description:
      '',
    imgStart: '',
    img: 'images/svg-1.svg',
    alt: 'Credit Card'
  };
